casebody.data:
John E. Ahrens, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided May 2, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon the report of a referee in favor of plaintiff. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and John S. Wood of counsel, for appellants. Edwin M. Felt, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

The Court (McAdam, J., writing, Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J., concurring,)

held that the judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
